definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few

sentences.english: Actually, it is one of the few industries that does.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這裏有所回報的行業屈指可數。

sentences.english: Classes seem without enough weight, consisting of only a few members.
sentences.chinese: 類顯得不夠重量級，僅僅包含屈指可數的幾個成員。

sentences.english: The few while you are here.
sentences.chinese: 你在這裏的時間已屈指可數。

sentences.english: Even a cat has limited number of lives.
sentences.chinese: 連一隻貓也只有屈指可數的幾條命，何況人乎？

sentences.english: It's no wonder that Taiwan's diplomatic allies can almost be counted on one hand.
sentences.chinese: 難怪臺灣的邦交國一直以來都屈指可數。

sentences.english: Netherlands than in bright stars, Stephen Strasburg Jersey only a handful of Japan's star.
sentences.chinese: 相比於荷蘭隊耀眼的星光，日本隊的球星屈指可數。

sentences.english: Only a handful contain any serious dance information.
sentences.chinese: 只有屈指可數的幾張照片包含嚴肅的舞蹈信息。

sentences.english: Few nations in the world have calligraphy as a form of art.
sentences.chinese: 世界上，擁有書法藝術的民族屈指可數。

sentences.english: The days of U.S. global economic dominance are numbered.
sentences.chinese: 美國獨霸全球經濟主導地位的日子已屈指可數了。

sentences.english: Its days as the world’s reserve currency are numbered.
sentences.chinese: 美元繼續作爲國際儲備貨幣的日子屈指可數了。

sentences.english: Vancouver, in particular, is one of the few most celebrated multi-ethnic cities in the world.
sentences.chinese: 溫哥華則更是世界上屈指可數的多民族城市。

sentences.english: Only a few small vehicles passed us on the road and most of the traffic was pedestrian traffic.
sentences.chinese: 從我們身旁路過的車屈指可數，絕大多數都是步行客。

sentences.english: But such projects are few and far between.
sentences.chinese: 但是這樣的外援項目屈指可數。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy and feasibility of the minimally invasive treatment to flexor tendon tenosynovitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討微創治療屈指肌腱腱鞘炎的療效與可行性。

sentences.english: Otherwise seeing animals was very scarce, beside some water buffalos .
sentences.chinese: 除此了一些水牛外，見到的動物屈指可數。

sentences.english: Calculating by heart, it's late winter, and the last month of the lunar year is coming hitchily.
sentences.chinese: 屈指算來，已是深冬，陰曆臘月的腳步在蹣跚走來。

definition: a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
the five fingers of one's hand
a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
delicate hands/woman's tender and soft hands
